question: Who was the UN High Commissioner for Refugees prior to his appointment?
oriSent: Prior to his appointment as Secretary-General, Mr. Guterres served as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from June 2005 to December He has centered his efforts on ensuring human dignity for all.
